00016 #include "em_device.h"
00017 #if defined( USB_PRESENT ) && ( USB_COUNT == 1 )
00018 #include "em_usb.h"

00021 #include "em_usbtypes.h"
00022 #include "em_usbhal.h"
00023 #include "em_usbd.h"

00027 /*
00028  * USBDEP_Ep0Handler() is called each time a packet has been transmitted
00029  * or recieved on the default endpoint.
00030  * A state machine navigate us through the phases of a control transfer
00031  * according to "chapter 9" in the USB spec.
00032  */
00033 #if !defined( USB_DOEP0INT_STUPPKTRCVD )
00034 void USBDEP_Ep0Handler( USBD_Device_TypeDef *device )
00035 {
00036   int status;
00037   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep;
00038   static bool statusIn;
00039   static uint32_t xferred;
00040   static USB_XferCompleteCb_TypeDef callback;
00041 
00042   ep = &device->ep[ 0 ];
00043   switch ( ep->state )
00044   {
00045     case D_EP_IDLE:
00046       ep->remaining = 0;
00047       ep->zlp = 0;
00048       callback = NULL;
00049       statusIn = false;
00050 
00051       status = USBDCH9_SetupCmd( device );
00052 
00053       if ( status == USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR )
00054       {
00055         ep->in = true;
00056         USBDHAL_StallEp( ep );              /* Stall Ep0 IN                 */
00057         ep->in = false;                     /* OUT for next SETUP           */
00058         USBDHAL_StallEp( ep );              /* Stall Ep0 OUT                */
00059         USBDHAL_ReenableEp0Setup( device ); /* Prepare for next SETUP packet*/
00060       }
00061       else /* ( Status == USB_STATUS_OK ) */
00062       {
00063         if ( (ep->state == D_EP_RECEIVING) || (ep->state == D_EP_TRANSMITTING) )
00064         {
00065           callback = ep->xferCompleteCb;
00066         }
00067 
00068         if ( ep->state != D_EP_RECEIVING )
00069         {
00070           if ( ep->remaining )
00071           {
00072             /* Data will be sent to host, check if a ZLP must be appended */
00073             if ( ( ep->remaining < device->setup->wLength ) &&
00074                  ( ep->remaining % ep->packetSize == 0    )    )
00075             {
00076               ep->zlp = 1;
00077             }
00078           }
00079           else
00080           {
00081             /* Prepare for next SETUP packet*/
00082             USBDHAL_ReenableEp0Setup( device );
00083 
00084             /* No data stage, a ZLP may have been sent. If not, send one */
00085 
00086             xferred = 0;
00087             if ( ep->zlp == 0 )
00088             {
00089               USBD_Write( 0, NULL, 0, NULL );             /* ACK to host */
00090               ep->state = D_EP0_IN_STATUS;
00091             }
00092             else
00093             {
00094               ep->state = D_EP_IDLE;
00095               ep->in = false;                      /* OUT for next SETUP */
00096             }
00097           }
00098         }
00099       }
00100       break;
00101 
00102     case D_EP_RECEIVING:
00103       if ( ep->remaining )
00104       {
00105         /* There is more data to receive */
00106         USBD_ReArmEp0( ep );
00107       }
00108       else
00109       {
00110         status = USB_STATUS_OK;
00111         if ( callback != NULL )
00112         {
00113           status = callback( USB_STATUS_OK, ep->xferred, 0 );
00114           callback = NULL;
00115         }
00116 
00117         if ( status != USB_STATUS_OK )
00118         {
00119           ep->in = true;
00120           USBDHAL_StallEp( ep );              /* Stall Ep0 IN                */
00121           ep->in = false;                     /* OUT for next SETUP           */
00122           USBDHAL_StallEp( ep );              /* Stall Ep0 OUT                */
00123           USBDHAL_ReenableEp0Setup( device ); /* Prepare for next SETUP pkt. */
00124           ep->state = D_EP_IDLE;
00125         }
00126         else /* Everything OK, send a ZLP (ACK) to host */
00127         {
00128           USBDHAL_ReenableEp0Setup( device );/* Prepare for next SETUP packet*/
00129 
00130           ep->state = D_EP_IDLE;              /* USBD_Write() sets state back*/
00131                                               /* to EP_TRANSMITTING          */
00132           USBD_Write( 0, NULL, 0, NULL );
00133           ep->state = D_EP0_IN_STATUS;
00134         }
00135       }
00136       break;
00137 
00138     case D_EP_TRANSMITTING:
00139       if ( ep->remaining )
00140       {
00141         /* There is more data to transmit */
00142         USBD_ReArmEp0( ep );
00143       }
00144       else
00145       {
00146         /* All data transferred, is a ZLP packet needed ? */
00147         if ( ep->zlp == 1 )
00148         {
00149           xferred   = ep->xferred;
00150           ep->state = D_EP_IDLE;          /* USBD_Write() sets state back */
00151                                           /* to EP_TRANSMITTING           */
00152           USBD_Write( 0, NULL, 0, NULL ); /* Send ZLP                     */
00153           ep->zlp = 2;
00154         }
00155         else
00156         {
00157           if ( ep->zlp == 0 )
00158           {
00159             xferred = ep->xferred;
00160           }
00161 
00162           ep->state = D_EP_IDLE;
00163           USBD_Read( 0, NULL, 0, NULL );  /* Get ZLP packet (ACK) from host */
00164           statusIn = true;
00165           ep->state = D_EP0_OUT_STATUS;
00166         }
00167       }
00168       break;
00169 
00170     case D_EP0_IN_STATUS:
00171     case D_EP0_OUT_STATUS:
00172       if ( statusIn )
00173       {
00174         USBDHAL_ReenableEp0Setup( device );
00175       }
00176 
00177       if ( callback != NULL )
00178       {
00179         callback( USB_STATUS_OK, xferred, 0 );
00180       }
00181 
00182       ep->state = D_EP_IDLE;
00183       ep->in = false;                     /* OUT for next SETUP */
00184       break;
00185 
00186     default:
00187       EFM_ASSERT( false );
00188       break;
00189   }
00190 }
00191 #endif
00192 
00193 #if defined( USB_DOEP0INT_STUPPKTRCVD )
00194 void USBDEP_Ep0Handler( USBD_Device_TypeDef *device )
00195 {
00196   int status;
00197   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep;
00198   static uint32_t xferred;
00199   static USB_XferCompleteCb_TypeDef callback;
00200 
00201   ep = &device->ep[ 0 ];
00202 
00203   switch ( ep->state )
00204   {
00205     case D_EP_IDLE:
00206       ep->zlp       = 0;
00207       ep->remaining = 0;
00208       callback      = NULL;
00209 
00210       status = USBDCH9_SetupCmd( device );
00211 
00212       if ( status == USB_STATUS_REQ_ERR )
00213       {
00214         ep->in = true;
00215         USBDHAL_StallEp( ep );              /* Stall Ep0 IN                 */
00216         ep->in = false;                     /* OUT for next SETUP           */
00217         USBDHAL_StallEp( ep );              /* Stall Ep0 OUT                */
00218         USBDHAL_StartEp0Setup( dev );       /* Prepare for next SETUP packet*/
00219       }
00220       else /* ( Status == USB_STATUS_OK ) */
00221       {
00222         if ( (ep->state == D_EP_RECEIVING) || (ep->state == D_EP_TRANSMITTING) )
00223         {
00224           callback = ep->xferCompleteCb;
00225         }
00226 
00227         if ( ep->state != D_EP_RECEIVING )
00228         {
00229           if ( ep->remaining )
00230           {
00231             /* Data will be sent to host, check if a ZLP must be appended */
00232             if ( ( ep->remaining < device->setup->wLength ) &&
00233                  ( ep->remaining % ep->packetSize == 0    )    )
00234             {
00235               ep->zlp = 1;
00236             }
00237           }
00238           else
00239           {
00240             /* No data stage, a ZLP may have been sent. If not, send one */
00241             xferred = 0;
00242             if ( ep->zlp == 0 )
00243             {
00244               ep->state = D_EP_IDLE;
00245               USBD_Write( 0, NULL, 0, NULL );             /* ACK to host */
00246               ep->state = D_EP0_IN_STATUS;
00247             }
00248           }
00249         }
00250       }
00251       break;
00252 
00253     case D_EP_RECEIVING:
00254       if ( ep->remaining )
00255       {
00256         ep->in = false;
00257         USBD_ReArmEp0( ep );
00258       }
00259       else
00260       {
00261         status = USB_STATUS_OK;
00262         if ( callback != NULL )
00263         {
00264           status = callback( USB_STATUS_OK, ep->xferred, 0 );
00265           callback = NULL;
00266         }
00267 
00268         if ( status != USB_STATUS_OK )
00269         {
00270           ep->in = true;
00271           USBDHAL_StallEp( ep );              /* Stall Ep0 IN                */
00272           ep->in = false;                     /* OUT for next SETUP          */
00273           USBDHAL_StallEp( ep );              /* Stall Ep0 OUT               */
00274           USBDHAL_StartEp0Setup( dev );       /* Prepare for next SETUP pkt. */
00275           ep->state = D_EP_IDLE;
00276         }
00277         else
00278         {
00279 
00280           USBDHAL_StartEp0Setup( dev );      /* Prepare for next SETUP packet*/
00281           ep->state = D_EP_IDLE;             /* USBD_Write() sets state back */
00282                                              /* to EP_TRANSMITTING           */
00283           USBD_Write( 0, NULL, 0, NULL );
00284           ep->state = D_EP0_IN_STATUS;
00285         }
00286       }
00287       break;
00288 
00289     case D_EP_TRANSMITTING:
00290       if ( ep->remaining )
00291       {
00292         ep->in = true;
00293         USBD_ReArmEp0( ep );
00294       }
00295       else
00296       {
00297         if ( ep->zlp == 1 )
00298         {
00299           xferred   = ep->xferred;
00300           ep->state = D_EP_IDLE;          /* USBD_Write() sets state back */
00301                                           /* to EP_TRANSMITTING           */
00302           USBD_Write( 0, NULL, 0, NULL ); /* Send ZLP                     */
00303           ep->zlp = 2;
00304         }
00305         else
00306         {
00307           if ( ep->zlp == 0 )
00308           {
00309             xferred = ep->xferred;
00310           }
00311 
00312           ep->state = D_EP_IDLE;
00313           USBD_Read( 0, NULL, 0, NULL );  /* Get ZLP packet (ACK) from host */
00314           ep->state = D_EP0_OUT_STATUS;
00315         }
00316       }
00317       break;
00318 
00319     case D_EP0_IN_STATUS:
00320       if ( ( USB->DOEP0CTL & USB_DOEP0CTL_EPENA ) == 0 )
00321       {
00322         /* Prepare for more SETUP Packets */
00323         USBDHAL_StartEp0Setup( dev );
00324       }
00325       if ( callback != NULL )
00326       {
00327         callback( USB_STATUS_OK, xferred, 0 );
00328       }
00329       ep->state = D_EP_IDLE;
00330       ep->in = false;                     /* OUT for next SETUP */
00331       break;
00332 
00333     case D_EP0_OUT_STATUS:
00334       USBDHAL_StartEp0Setup( dev );       /* Prepare for more SETUP Packets */
00335       if ( callback != NULL )
00336       {
00337         callback( USB_STATUS_OK, xferred, 0 );
00338       }
00339       ep->state = D_EP_IDLE;
00340       ep->in = false;                     /* OUT for next SETUP */
00341       break;
00342   }
00343 }
00344 #endif
00345 
00346 /*
00347  * USBDEP_EpHandler() is called each time a packet has been transmitted
00348  * or recieved on an endpoint other than the default endpoint.
00349  */
00350 void USBDEP_EpHandler( uint8_t epAddr )
00351 {
00352   USB_XferCompleteCb_TypeDef callback;
00353   USBD_Ep_TypeDef *ep = USBD_GetEpFromAddr( epAddr );
00354 
00355   if ( ( ep->state == D_EP_TRANSMITTING ) || ( ep->state == D_EP_RECEIVING ) )
00356   {
00357     ep->state = D_EP_IDLE;
00358     if ( ep->xferCompleteCb )
00359     {
00360       callback = ep->xferCompleteCb;
00361       ep->xferCompleteCb = NULL;
00362       callback( USB_STATUS_OK, ep->xferred, ep->remaining );
00363     }
00364   }
00365   else
00366   {
00367     EFM_ASSERT( false );
00368   }
00369 }
00370
